aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.description: I'm a passionate Front-End Developer with over {{years}} years of experience building modern and scalable web applications. I specialize in React, TypeScript, and Next.js, and I started my career in the freelance market, where I learned to handle diverse projects, replicate prototypes exactly as designed, and deliver high-quality responsive solutions. I work with agile methodologies, value clean code, and foster a positive, collaborative work environment while continuously learning new technologies and improving my skills.

location.label: Location
location.text: I'm based in Guarapuava, PR - Brazil, but I work remotely with teams worldwide.
